ygData.subject: Re: Finally 15 but where now?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Farr, Robert [mailto:robert.farr@trane.com] Sent: Thursday, June 03, 1999 1:20 PM To: eqenchanters@onelist.com Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Finally
ygData.messageBody:
???? Which keep are you talking about ?

-----Original Message-----
From: Farr, Robert [mailto:robert.farr@...]
Sent: Thursday, June 03, 1999 1:20 PM
To: 'eqenchanters@onelist.com'
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Finally 15 but where now?


From: "Farr, Robert" <robert.farr@...>

Umm.. if you stick to the right, you won't be finding the keep coming from
Qeynos. Stick to the left and you will do much better, as the keep is on
the north side of the pass...

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Andrea Maionchi [SMTP:okandrea@...]
> Sent: Thursday, June 03, 1999 3:13 PM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Finally 15 but where now?
>
> From: "Andrea Maionchi" <okandrea@...>
>
> Thank you, I will take your advice!
> let you know soon how I fared.
>
> Eregil - Erudite Enchanter
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: DeGirolami, Franck <degirolami@...>
> To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
> Sent: gioved∩┐╜ 3 giugno 1999 20.37
> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Finally 15 but where now?
>
>
> > From: "DeGirolami, Franck" <degirolami@...>
> >
> > the best place you can go for soloing at this level is Lavastorm. It
> will
> > bring you at level 18 in no time. After 18, it's still good but not as
> good.
> > To get there, Take the boat to Freeport, go in East Commons, enter
> Nektulos
> > forest ( follow the right wall to get there )and turn into a dark elf
> then
> > follow the path straight all the way to lavastorm. as you enter
> lavastorm,
> > follow the right edge and you'll soon find the entrance of the Najena
> > dungeon. This is a great place to hunt. Xp is amazing on the lavas
> crawlers.
> > Loot is also pretty good ( although not extraordinary ). Hunt in
> Lavastorm
> > and zone in najena if there is any trouble.
> > Also, this place is full of darkies, ogres and trolls so if you like
> duels,
> > you'll have a good time.
> > Note: A magic weapon can help...try to buy or get a runed totem staff
> first.
> > Skara de Toxxulia.
>
>
